title: Eric Garcetti’s Path to Ambassadorship Constricts After Senate Report - The New York Times
content:
1. Eric Garcetti’s Path to Ambassadorship Constricts After Senate Report  The New York Times
  2. LA Mayor Garcetti 'likely knew' of 'widespread' sexual harassment, racist remarks by ex-adviser: Senate report  Fox News
  3. Senate report alleges Mayor Eric Garcetti likely knew about allegations against advisor  CBS Los Angeles
  4. Grassley releases report on US ambassador to India nominee Eric Garcetti and says he will lift hold on nomination  CNN
  5. Garcetti responds to Senate Republican report about aide’s alleged sexual harassment  KTLA Los Angeles
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Mayor Eric Garcetti’s political future is unclear after a Senate report determined that he “more likely than not” knew about sexual harassment accusations against a top aide.
